messages.title: How we can change the future together
messages.content: Control our borders, Invest in the NHS, Fairer tax system, Spend here, not abroad

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £350 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £350 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.
issues.economy: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
issues.health: UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
issues.immigration: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear Voter, I was born, educated and have lived in London all my life. I’ve been a businessman for 28 years, Chairman of a NHS Trust for 5 years and also served as an elected Councillor in London from 2008-2014. These real life experiences have enabled me to get a very good understanding of how government works at all levels and how to enable change effectively. If selected as your MP I will champion for more money into the NHS, better schools, lower net immigration and more jobs and training placements for our young people.

contactInformation.address: Printed by press. Southmead, Lottbridge Drove, Eastbourne, East Sussex, BN23 6QD. Promoted by Chris Mendes on behalf of Afzal Akram both at UKIP Ealing, Perceval House 14-16 Uxbridge Road Ealing, W5 2HL.

images.caption: Afzal Akram. Standing Up for Real Change
